Coupon.ResetDate: 2 Toronto business days prior to the beginning of the coupon period
Coupon.AccrualDate: 2 Toronto business days prior to the beginning of the coupon period
Coupon.PaymentDate: 26 of each February, May, August and November commencing 26 August 2009 with a final payment on the Maturity Date

GoverningLaw: Province of Ontario and the laws of Canada applicable therein

LeadManager.Name: Royal Bank of Canada Europe Limited

Swiss.Exemption: Qualified investors (as defined in the CISA and its implementing regulations)

HongKong.Exemption: Professional investors (as defined in the Securities and Futures Ordinance (Chapter 571 of the Laws of Hong Kong))

Singapore.Exemption: Institutional investor (as defined in section 274 of the Securities and Futures Act, chapter 289 of Singapore)

Canada.Exemption: PPN regulations issued by the Department of Finance

SalesRestrictions.OnSales: In accordance with any applicable law and regulation

Status: Direct, unsecured and unsubordinated obligations of the Issuer

SwitchFeature.NoticePeriod: 5 business days prior to the period start date
